sqlQuery.name: OrfMotifFiles
sqlQuery.sql: select abbrev.organism as term, abbrev.abbreviation || 'ORFs' || '_' || orgs.project_id || '.fasta' as internal From apidb.organismabbreviationws abbrev, (select distinct organism, project_id from apidb.sequenceattributes ) orgs where orgs.organism = abbrev.organism and (orgs.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' OR 'EuPathDB' = '@PROJECT_ID@')

sqlQuery.name: GenomicMotifFiles
sqlQuery.sql: select abbrev.organism as term, abbrev.abbreviation || 'Genomic' || '_' || orgs.project_id || '.fasta' as internal From apidb.organismabbreviationws abbrev, (select distinct organism, project_id from apidb.sequenceattributes ) orgs where orgs.organism = abbrev.organism and (orgs.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' OR 'EuPathDB' = '@PROJECT_ID@')

sqlQuery.name: AnnotatedProteinMotifFiles
sqlQuery.sql: select abbrev.organism as term, abbrev.abbreviation || 'AnnotatedProteins' || '_' || orgs.project_id || '.fasta' as internal From apidb.organismabbreviationws abbrev, (select distinct organism, project_id from apidb.geneattributes ) orgs where orgs.organism = abbrev.organism and (orgs.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' OR 'EuPathDB' = '@PROJECT_ID@')
